attributes.action: Stop the discrimination of unmetered water supply customers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the discrimination of unmetered water customers.

For the first time ever I recently had to ask for financial assistance from South West Water, our family met all the criteria for help with one exception, that our water supply is not metered - and we therefore were not entittled to assistance, according to SW Water this is a Govenment guideline.  The media states that if you have more people than bedrooms then it is unechonomical to change to a water meter, I used my common sence and feel that the water companies (and Govenment) are now discrimating against me and my family at our time of need. I know the water companies would all like us all on meter's (and maybe this is another way of forcing us) - but what happened to human rights, Why should I and other unmetered Customers not be entittled to help, when we are buying the same product/service?
